casebody.data:
N. N. PETTERSON, as owner of THE Barge L. J. TOMLINSON, Libelant-Appellee, v. THE Tug DOROTHY, Her Engines, etc., Sivert J. Kron and Christoffer A. Olsen, Claimants-Appellants. No. 180. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Jan. 22, 1934. Winifred Sullivan, of New York City, for appellants. Maeklin, Brown, Lenahan & Speer, of New York City (Gerald J. MeKernan and *1013Joseph B. Lane, Jr., both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAjND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

_ Decree affirmed.
